Label: Discount amount
Description: A discount expressed as an absolute amount per copy. Optional and non-repeating; but either <DiscountPercent> or <DiscountAmount> or both must be present in each occurrence of the <Discount> composite. Note that when both are present, they represent two different expressions of the same discount – the discounts are not cumulative.
Format: <dd>Positive real number, with explicit decimal point when required, or zero, suggested maximum length 12 characters</dd>
